amendment.description: To appropriate funds for crisis in Darfur and Chad.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3493 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3493 proposed by Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR S7367, S7370-7372; text: CR S7367) To appropriate funds for crisis in Darfur and Chad.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3493 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3493 proposed by Senator DeWine.
